discourse_list.title: LexDAO talking Celsius and how it is planning to pay Maker (and other protocols) back and here is a link to the complaint

content.content: LexDAO, a legal engineering DAO, tweeted the below. If you have twitter I encourage you to comment and show up strong for Maker.  Here is also a link to the complaint filed in NYS court. This is an interesting read https://iapps.courts.state.ny.us/nyscef/ViewDocument?docIndex=RvF30Mz2IZW63s1mjjau2Q==&TSPD_101_R0=08533cd43fab2000e4239b28cc521b5fe1fece2507914628471226ba3a6a78b0835f7a8ca68bee57088158a7fa143000aa663a2b1972253d39b908d7d333f3cd0ad261d9164ee8df3d5bf7d740bb9fb113e053155bfd64b8c2e1e787ac565e84   twitter.com    LexDAO @lex_DAO  I know you're all waiting for us to give you some update on the $SOL lawsuit.   It was filed. Others have covered it.  Of potentially more interest is Celsius paying back DeFi protocols: @AaveAave @compoundfinance & @MakerDAO.  Legal engineers: Are the smart contracts working⁉️   10:33 PM - 7 Jul 2022           1
